com.compendium.core.db
Class DBWorkspace

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBWorkspace

public class DBWorkspace
extends java.lang.Object

The DBWorkspace class serves as the interface layer between the Workspaces and the Workspace table in the database.

Author:
Michelle Bachler

insert

public static boolean insert(DBConnection dbcon,
                             java.lang.String sWorkspaceID,
                             java.lang.String sUserID,
                             java.lang.String sName,
                             java.util.Vector vtViews)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new Workspace into the database and returns if successful.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
String - sWorkspaceID, the id of the new workspace.
String - sUserID, the id of the user whose workspace it is.
String - sName, the name of the workspace.
String - vtViews, a Vector of the WorkspaceView objects in this workspace.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

public static boolean update(DBConnection dbcon,
                             java.lang.String sWorkspaceID,
                             java.lang.String sUserID,
                             java.lang.String sName,
                             java.util.Vector vtViews)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Update a Workspace in the database and returns if successful.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
String - sWorkspaceID, the id of the workspace to update.
String - sUserID, the id of the user whose workspave to update.
String - sName, the name of the workspace.
String - vtViews, a Vector of the WorkspaceView objects in this updated Workspace.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

delete

public static boolean delete(DBConnection dbcon,
                             java.lang.String sUserID,
                             java.lang.String sWorkspaceIDs)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Deletes the Workspaces with the given user and WorkspaceIDs from the database.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
String - sUserID, the id of the user whose Workspace records to delete.
String - sWorkspaceIDs, a String of comma separated workspace id to delete.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getWorkspaces

public static java.util.Vector getWorkspaces(DBConnection dbcon,
                                             java.lang.String sUserID)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns a Vector of all Workspace data for the given UserID.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
String - sUserID, the id of the user whose workspaces to return.
Returns:
Vector, a list of Vectors with the Workspace data for the given user. Each inner Vector contains:
  • WorkspaceID - String
  • Name - String
  • CreationDate - Double (milliseconds)
  • ModificationDate - Double (milliseconds)
    Throws:
    java.sql.SQLException

    • getWorkspace

    public static java.util.Vector getWorkspace(DBConnection dbcon,
                                            java.lang.String sWorkspaceID)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
    Returns a Vector of the Workspace data for the given WorkspaceID

    Parameters:
    DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
    String - sWorkspaceID, the id of the workspace whose data to return.
    Returns:
    Vector, which contains:
  • WorkspaceID - String
  • Name - String
  • CreationDate - Double (milliseconds)
  • ModificationDate - Double (milliseconds)
    Throws:
    java.sql.SQLException
